<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Clears the notification policy tree</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"delete"} path={"/v1/provisioning/policies"}></MethodEndpoint>



Clears the notification policy tree. Please ensure to change the region in the URL to match your account's region.

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"202"} value={"202"}><div>

Not Found
